name: Golden Card for classical card, casual card
name_original: Golden Card for classical card, casual card
description:
With a brand new game design, brand new game engine and brand new dazzling game effects, Solitaire Golden Lite is deserved to be one of the most popular card games from pole to pole.

We designed the app for you with our utmost care. So, here are two sets of card styles, normal card style and cartoon card style.

What’s more, there are so many background effects for you to choose, where in, each background is redesigned to make the game more user-friendly and playable.

Built-in classical simple card play and three cards play.

Last but not least, we add Game Center to the app, so you can compete with your friends freely.
